about_the_game:
Story
Interregnum's first free dlc is with you.You are serving your country in difficult times.You must stop the rebellion that started with the war.Our spies have deciphered the rebel camp.Banish the traitors!

Gameplay
We wanted to combine medieval with the marksman theme.We tried to maintain the map features in the main game.

In the Future
we haven't added sound recording.To be added as soon as possible.

content_descriptors.notes: Primitive weapons are used in the game.

detailed_description:
Story
Interregnum's first free dlc is with you.You are serving your country in difficult times.You must stop the rebellion that started with the war.Our spies have deciphered the rebel camp.Banish the traitors!

Gameplay
We wanted to combine medieval with the marksman theme.We tried to maintain the map features in the main game.

In the Future
we haven't added sound recording.To be added as soon as possible.
name: Interregnum - Dark Archer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Rebel camp deciphered.We have to stand rebels off.Use your arrows carefully.
